    üßë‚Äçüíª Biography

    I am a second year Ph.D. student at University of Virginia, supervised by Prof. Anil Vullikanti. Prior to that, I obtained my master degree at Imperial College London, where I worked with Prof. Alessio and Dr. Yang Zheng, and I obtained my bachelor degree at Dalian University of Technology, where I worked with Prof. Xuewen Huang

    üìö Research Interests

    I am broadly interested in Large Language Models, Generative AI, especially from a safety and privacy lens.

    üì¢ Recent News
